function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing in suburban streets due to increased pedestrian, jogger, and cyclist activity","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease transmission and spread in suburban areas","Mitigation":"Enforcing social distancing measures, creating designated pedestrian/cyclist lanes, and increasing public awareness","Technologies":"Traffic management systems, surveillance cameras for monitoring social distancing compliance","People":"Pedestrians, joggers, cyclists, residents in suburban areas","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Crowdfunding and volunteer delivery services increasing physical interaction and potential exposure to the virus","Impact":"Higher risk of infection for volunteers and recipients of delivery services","Mitigation":"Implement contactless delivery, proper personal protective equipment (PPE) for volunteers, and regular testing for COVID-19","Technologies":"Contactless delivery systems, digital payment platforms, COVID-19 testing kits","People":"Volunteers, recipients of delivery services, crowdfunding participants","Owner":"Volunteer organizations, healthcare providers, crowdfunding platforms"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and consideration for front-line workers in essential businesses","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and exposure for front-line workers","Mitigation":"Provide adequate protective measures, enforce social distancing, and promote public appreciation for front-line workers","Technologies":"PPE distribution systems, workplace safety monitoring technologies, public awareness campaigns","People":"Front-line workers, customers, general public","Owner":"Employers, government, public health authorities"}]}
